blasphemy.description: This mortal sin is a form of sacrilege and profanes the real presence of Christ and shows grave disrespect for the sacrament by receiving unworthily.

blasphemy.question: Did you receive Holy Communion while knowing that your heart was not in the right place, leading to unworthy participation?
blasphemy.description: This mortal sin is a form of sacrilege and profanes the real presence of Christ and shows grave disrespect for the sacrament by receiving unworthily.

extracted_data_phrases: especially in moments where humility was needed
ambition.question: Did my pursuit for recognition and prestige in my career influence how I interact with colleagues, especially in moments where humility was needed?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: with those in positions of authority , such as at work or in community roles
in positions of authority , such as at work or in community roles
such as at work or in community roles
at work or in community roles
ambition.question: Did your desire for power and dominance influence how you interact with those in positions of authority, such as at work or in community roles?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: especially with those closest to me
ambition.question: Did I let my desire for power and dominance influence my decision-making and interactions within my relationships, especially with those closest to me?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: through your words , actions , or decisions
oppression.question: Have you mistreated, harassed, or discriminated against others through your words, actions, or decisions?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted my own accomplishments, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or inappropriate language, causing them undue distress and damaging relationships?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in ways that were crude , unbecoming , or hurtful to others
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and use words to express myself in ways that were crude, unbecoming, or hurtful to others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking to an excessive degree
to your established self - care habits
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking to an excessive degree, contrary to your established self-care habits?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures that rejects the call to temperance
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures that rejects the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to enjoying treats after a yoga class
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, particularly when it comes to enjoying treats after a yoga class or while engaging in other leisure activities?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked family financial stability through gambling, prioritizing it over essential household needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in spending habits that compromise my family 's financial obligations or well - being
prodigality.question: Have I excessively indulged in spending habits that compromise my family's financial obligations or well-being?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I spent excessively on leisure activities, prioritizing them over my family's financial needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: by engaging in conversations that were not necessary or productive
in conversations that were not necessary or productive
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, by engaging in conversations that were not necessary or productive?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I shared another's private affairs for entertainment, even if what I shared was true, using words that harmed their reputation?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday when it otherwise could have been avoided
impiety.question: Did I engage in work on a Sunday when it otherwise could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impiety.question: Did I engage in any activity on a Sunday, a day set aside for rest and worship, when it was possible to avoid doing so?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
